title: janani shrI jaganmAtA
sahitya:
janani shrI jaganmAtA en vinai nI tIrttaruL tA parAshakti


anupallavi

  enai nI marandu inmozhi turandu iruppinum unnai igazhEn annai


caraNam    isai iranda yAzhil iniya paN varumO illaiyun dayai enil vAzhvu inimai perumO
dishai turanda dONi pOl tavikkuden idayam tAmadam tOTramO unnaruL udayam
